template.name: scrollview
template.value:
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" >

</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

button_with_image
template.value:
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/contact_us" android:layout_width="250dp" android:layout_height="38dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/box_white_border_grey_rounded" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_default" >
<ImageView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:src="@drawable/ic_contact" android:layout_marginRight="8dp"/>
<com.musement.android.widget.TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:gravity="center" tools:text="my button" android:textColor="#787878" android:textSize="16sp" /> </LinearLayout>

template.name: IllegalStateException
